word_mean: 从出巢到独立生活这一发育阶段，常需成鸟喂食的鸟。

sentence.Network_en: He was chosen in 1996 begin training for China's fledgling space programme.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 导读：他们是象牙塔里的大学生，也是初出茅庐(fledgling)小老板。如今大学生开网店成了热门，甭管在校的、毕业的，创业的学生已 …
‧雏儿（Fledgling）：又称为「子嗣」（childe），除了该隐之外，每个吸血鬼都必定是另一位血族的「子嗣」。雏儿是刚获新生不久…

list.abs: a fledgling enterprise ; a fledgling skier ; an unfledged lawyer ., 羽翼未丰的企业 ; 初学的滑雪者 ; 初出茅庐的律师.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from the obsolete adjective fledge (see fledge), on the pattern of nestling

entry.tran: 刚长羽毛的小鸟;刚学飞的幼鸟
entry.def: A fledgling is a young bird that has its feathers and is learning to fly.

entry.tran: 新手的;(组织或系统)新建的，没有经验的
entry.def: You use fledgling to describe a person, organization, or system that is new or without experience.

example.ex: ...the sound practical advice he gave to fledgling writers.
example.tran: 他给初出茅庐的作家提出的可靠实用的建议

means.word_mean: 1. any new participant in some activity
2. young bird that has just fledged or become capable of flying
1. of a young bird just having acquired its flight feathers;
